title: Jungle Potion

properties.value: Jungle Potion is a short quest taking place on Karamja. It involves gathering a handful of different herbs for Trufitus Shakaya, in order for him to perform a ritual to communicate with the island's gods.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Jungle PotionThe RuneScape Classic Wiki also has an article on: classicrsw:Jungle Potion
 This quest has a quick guide found here.
It briefly summarises the steps needed to complete the quest.
Jungle Potion (#39)
Released 23 October 2002 (Update)
Members Yes
Quest series None
Official difficulty Novice
Lead developer(s) Tytn H

Jungle Potion is a short quest taking place on Karamja. It involves gathering a handful of different herbs for Trufitus Shakaya, in order for him to perform a ritual to communicate with the island's gods.

Contents

  • 1 Details
  • 2 Walkthrough
    • 2.1 Getting started
    • 2.2 Snake Weed
    • 2.3 Ardrigal
    • 2.4 Sito Foil
    • 2.5 Volencia Moss
    • 2.6 Rogue's Purse
  • 3 Rewards
  • 4 Required for completing
  • 5 Transcript
  • 6 Trivia

Details[edit | edit source]

Start point Speak to Trufitus near Tai Bwo Wannai.
Official difficultyNovice
DescriptionTrufitus Shakaya of the Tai Bwo Wannai Village requires that you collect five special jungle herbs for a potion so he can commune with his Gods.
Official lengthShort
Requirements
  • 3 Herblore (boostable)
  • The ability to defend against level 53 Jogres and level 46 Harpie Bug Swarms.
  • Completion of Druidic Ritual
Items required None
Recommended
  • 20 Combat level
  • 1-2 Antidote++ or other Antipoison potions
  • Food
  • Stamina potions
  • Fast travel to the Tai Bwo Wannai Village (Brimhaven teleport, Teleport to House if your house is in Brimhaven, charter ship or ship from Ardougne to Brimhaven, Fairy Rings to ckr or Amulet of Glory to Karamja)
  • Spade to dig up the Clue hunter trousers
Enemies to defeat None
{"requirements":"* <span class=\"scp\" data-skill=\"Herblore\" data-level=\"3\">[[File:Herblore icon.png|21x21px|link=Herblore|alt=Herblore]] 3 [[Herblore]]</span> <sup>(<span title=\"This requirement is boostable\" style=\"cursor:help; text-decoration: underline dotted;\">boostable</span>)</sup>\n* The ability to defend against level 53 [[Jogre]]s and level 46 [[Harpie Bug Swarm]]s.\n* Completion of [[Druidic Ritual]]","desc":"[[Trufitus Shakaya]] of the [[Tai Bwo Wannai Village]] requires that you collect five special jungle herbs for a potion so he can commune with his Gods.","difficulty":"Novice","kills":"None","name":"Jungle Potion","start":"Speak to [[Trufitus]] near [[Tai Bwo Wannai]].","length":"Short","items":""}

Walkthrough[edit | edit source]

Getting started[edit | edit source]

Locations of all materials.

Head to the small village of Tai Bwo Wannai, south of Brimhaven on Karamja. (A charter ship can be used to get to Brimhaven).

Talk to Trufitus, found in a small house north-east of the main village area. Ask him where everyone is, and he says that they've left the village.

Ask him about how you can help, and he tells you that he needs several herbs to mix a potion so that he can commune with the Gods. Tell him that you'll give it a try.

Note: You cannot collect all of the herbs at once. You will need to go back to talk with Trufitus each time.

Snake Weed[edit | edit source]

The first herb is called snake weed.

Head south-west of the village near the ocean and find Marshy Jungle Vine. Search it to get a grimy snake weed (might take 1–5 minutes, with increased speed with higher Herblore). Clean the herb and give it to Trufitus.

Note: If you intend to do Legends' Quest and Zogre Flesh Eaters, take three snake weeds to save yourself time later.

Ardrigal[edit | edit source]

Head north-east of Trufitus' hut until you reach a peninsula with several palm trees on it (just south of an agility shortcut).

Search a palm tree to find a grimy ardrigal. Clean the herb and give it to Trufitus.

Level 46 Harpie Bug Swarms will attack you the entire time you're searching for the herb and can easily kill an unwary lower leveled player.

Note: If you intend to do Legends' Quest, take two ardrigals to save yourself time later, three for long path.

Sito Foil[edit | edit source]

The location of the sito foil.

Go south-west to the middle of the village, and on the western side, and just north of the westernmost table should be a patch of scorched earth. Search it to find the grimy sito foil. Clean the herb and give it to Trufitus.

Volencia Moss[edit | edit source]

The location of the volencia moss.

Head south-east of the hut until you reach a group of rocks you can search that are in the mining area, search an empty one to find the grimy volencia moss. Clean the herb and give it to Trufitus.

Note: If you intend to do Fairytale I - Growing Pains take an extra Volencia Moss as you may need one for the quest.

Rogue's Purse[edit | edit source]

The location of the rogue's purse.

Rogue's purse can be found north of the village. Head north-east towards where you found the Ardrigal. Once you find the end of the cliffs, follow the coastline west until you find a pile of searchable rocks. Search them and enter the cave.

Note: (optional) Bring a spade to about 13-16 tiles north-west of cave entrance (before entering cave) and dig around for the Clue hunter trousers.

Once inside the cave, run south past the level 53 Jogres until you find a Fungus covered Cavern wall. Search it until you find the grimy rogue's purse (may take some minutes). Consider collecting an extra rogue's purse if you plan on completing Zogre Flesh Eaters to save the extra trip.

Note: The Jogres can also drop the grimy rogue's purse, however Trufitus will not accept it. Killing a Jogre in this dungeon is a task for the Karamja Easy Diary.

Warning: Jogres are aggressive, be wary if you have low defence or hitpoints.

Return to Trufitus with the final cleaned herb.

Quest complete!

Rewards[edit | edit source]

  • 1 Quest point
  • 775 Herblore experience

Required for completing[edit | edit source]

Completion of Jungle Potion is required for the following:

  • My Arm's Big Adventure - To work in the Tai Bwo Wannai Cleanup minigame during the quest
  • Shilo Village
  • Tai Bwo Wannai Trio
  • Zogre Flesh Eaters
  • Several tasks in the Karamja Diary
  • Fairytale I - Growing Pains (For ironmen asked to obtain Proboscis or Volencia moss)

Transcript[edit | edit source]

This article on a quest has an associated dialogue page.
Click here for a transcript of possible conversations encountered throughout the quest.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • After completing the quest, players can cash in additional cleaned herbs for a small amount of coins.

'''Jungle Potion''' is a short quest taking place on [[Karamja]]. It involves gathering a handful of different [[herbs]] for [[Trufitus|Trufitus Shakaya]], in order for him to perform a ritual to communicate with the island's gods.

==Details==
{{Quest details
|start = Speak to [[Trufitus]] near [[Tai Bwo Wannai]].
|difficulty = Novice
|description = [[Trufitus Shakaya]] of the [[Tai Bwo Wannai Village]] requires that you collect five special jungle herbs for a potion so he can commune with his Gods.
|length = Short
|requirements = 
* {{SCP|Herblore|3|link=yes}} {{Boostable|yes}}
* The ability to defend against level 53 [[Jogre]]s and level 46 [[Harpie Bug Swarm]]s.
* Completion of [[Druidic Ritual]]
|items =
|recommended = 
* {{SCP|Combat|20|link=yes}}
* 1-2 [[Antidote++]] or other [[Antipoison]] potions
* [[Food]]
* [[Stamina potion]]s
* Fast travel to the [[Tai Bwo Wannai Village]] ([[Brimhaven teleport]], [[Teleport to House]] if your house is in Brimhaven, [[charter ship]] or ship from Ardougne to Brimhaven, [[Fairy Rings]] to {{fairycode|ckr}} or [[Amulet of Glory]] to Karamja)
* [[Spade]] to dig up the [[Clue hunter trousers]]
}}

==Walkthrough==
===Getting started===
{{Map|align=right|mtype=pin|caption=Locations of all materials.
|2810,3086,title:[[Trufitus]],icon:bluePin,desc:
|2764,3046,title:[[Snake weed]],desc:
|2784,3067,title:[[Sito foil]],desc:
|2824,3119,title:[[Rogue's purse]],desc:
|2875,3121,title:[[Ardrigal]],desc:
|2849,3033,title:[[Volencia moss]],desc:
}}
Head to the small village of [[Tai Bwo Wannai]], south of [[Brimhaven]] on [[Karamja]]. (A [[charter ship]] can be used to get to Brimhaven).

Talk to [[Trufitus]], found in a small house north-east of the main village area. Ask him where everyone is, and he says that they've left the village.

Ask him about how you can help, and he tells you that he needs several [[herb]]s to mix a [[potions|potion]] so that he can commune with the Gods. Tell him that you'll give it a try.
:'''Note:''' You cannot collect all of the herbs at once. You will need to go back to talk with Trufitus each time.

===Snake Weed===
The first herb is called [[snake weed]].

Head south-west of the village near the ocean and find Marshy Jungle Vine. Search it to get a [[grimy snake weed]] (might take 1–5 minutes, with increased speed with higher [[Herblore]]). Clean the herb and give it to [[Trufitus]].

:'''Note: If you intend to do [[Legends' Quest]] and [[Zogre Flesh Eaters]], take three snake weeds to save yourself time later.'''

===Ardrigal===
Head north-east of [[Trufitus]]' hut until you reach a peninsula with several palm trees on it (just south of an [[Shortcuts|agility shortcut]]).

Search a palm tree to find a [[grimy ardrigal]]. Clean the herb and give it to [[Trufitus]].

'''Level 46 [[Harpie Bug Swarm]]s will attack you the entire time you're searching for the herb and can easily kill an unwary lower leveled player.''' 

:'''Note:''' '''If you intend to do [[Legends' Quest]], take two ardrigals to save yourself time later, three for long path.'''

===Sito Foil===
[[File:Jungle Potion - Sito foil.png|thumb|220px|The location of the [[sito foil]].]]
Go south-west to the middle of the village, and on the western side, and just north of the westernmost table should be a patch of scorched earth. Search it to find the [[grimy sito foil]]. Clean the herb and give it to [[Trufitus]].

===Volencia Moss===
[[File:Jungle Potion - Valencia moss.png|thumb|220px|The location of the [[volencia moss]].]]
Head south-east of the hut until you reach a group of rocks you can search that are in the mining area, search an empty one to find the [[grimy volencia moss]]. Clean the herb and give it to [[Trufitus]].
:'''Note: If you intend to do [[Fairytale I - Growing Pains]] take an extra Volencia Moss as you may need one for the quest.'''

===Rogue's Purse===
[[File:Jungle Potion - Rogue's purse.png|thumb|220px|The location of the [[rogue's purse]].]]
[[Rogue's purse]] can be found north of the village. Head north-east towards where you found the Ardrigal. Once you find the end of the cliffs, follow the coastline west until you find a pile of searchable rocks. Search them and enter the cave.

'''Note:''' (optional) Bring a [[spade]] to about 13-16 tiles north-west of cave entrance (before entering cave) and dig around for the [[Clue hunter trousers]].

Once inside the cave, run south past the level 53 [[Jogre]]s until you find a [[Fungus covered Cavern wall]]. Search it until you find the grimy rogue's purse (may take some minutes). '''Consider collecting an extra rogue's purse if you plan on completing [[Zogre Flesh Eaters]] to save the extra trip.'''

'''Note:''' The [[Jogre]]s can also drop the grimy [[rogue's purse]], however Trufitus will not accept it. Killing a Jogre in this dungeon is a task for the [[Karamja Diary|Karamja Easy Diary]].

:'''Warning''': Jogres are aggressive, be wary if you have low defence or hitpoints.

Return to Trufitus with the final cleaned herb.

'''Quest complete!'''

==Required for completing==
Completion of Jungle Potion is required for the following:
*[[My Arm's Big Adventure]] - To work in the [[Tai Bwo Wannai Cleanup]] [[minigame]] during the quest
*[[Shilo Village]]
*[[Tai Bwo Wannai Trio]]
*[[Zogre Flesh Eaters]]
*Several tasks in the [[Karamja Diary]]
*[[Fairytale I - Growing Pains]] (For [[Ironman mode|ironmen]] asked to obtain Proboscis or Volencia moss)
